name: Beyond (itch) (Crusher5)
description:
Beyond is a 2D side scroller/top-down shooter, that has you explore an unfamiliar space ship to eliminate all hostiles and progress through the ship's levels.

or so it seems...

Credit:

All of the sound effects (except glitch) in game are from soundbible.com

Glitch sound effect is from: 

All other assets or music were made either by me or the team.

Main system requirement: 6GB of RAM

This game was made for the 2021 Wowie game jam.
